name: Pizza Chicken
ingredients: 1 boneless chicken breast, pounded flat if thick
Salt, pepper, garlic powder and Italian seasoning, to taste

instructions.en: Season the chicken with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and Italian seasoning.
Sauté mushrooms and pepper rings in butter or oil until slightly tender; set aside.
Spread pizza sauce over the grilled chicken.
Top with pepperoni, pepper rings, mushrooms, and shredded mozzarella cheese.
Bake at 350º for 10-15 minutes or until hot and the cheese is melted.

notes: Makes 1 serving. Can be frozen but the peppers will get soft.
